updates.title: OpenAI launches ChatGPT group chats in pilot across Japan, New Zealand, South Korea, and Taiwan, enabling collaborative AI conversations directly within the app.
Google expands AI shopping capabilities with conversational search, agentic checkout, and an AI agent that calls stores to check local inventory availability.
AI coding assistant Cursor raises $2.3 billion just 5 months after its previous funding round, planning to expand development of its Composer AI model for enhanced code generation.
Google's NotebookLM adds 'Deep Research' tool that automates complex online research and expands support for additional file types, enhancing AI-powered research workflows.
ElevenLabs strikes celebrity voice deals with Michael Caine and Matthew McConaughey to create AI-generated audio content, expanding their voice synthesis platform with licensed celebrity voices.
